item.description:
Comedy Night at The Barn Pub & Grille

Let's go check out their last comedy show until Fall 2012, in the line up will be:

Mark Scalia: Boston Comedy Riot Semi-Finalist ♦ Performed at Boston Int’l Comedy Festival, Seattle Int’l Comedy Festival and New Orleans Comedy Festival ♦ New England comic that has performed all over the U.S. and Canada!

Dave Andrews: Comedic Musician ♦ Performed all in Las Vegas, Atlantic City and is a New England Favorite ♦ Has opened for musical acts like Huey Lewis & the News, KC & the Sunshine Band and more!

Taylor Connelly: Performed at Boston Comedy Festival and Cleveland Comedy Festival ♦ Comedy Connection in Rhode Island.

Cost: $ 15.00. When you call for your ticket tell them you are with "THE MEETUP GROUP".           Please put on your RSVP if you have called for your ticket.

Phone # to get your ticket: (978) 388-8700.

Seating: They will have a table (or 2 reserved for us).

Parking: Plenty of parking in the back of the building.

If you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811, note the phone will be shut off 15 minutes before the show starts.

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  Thank you for paying your dues.

Look forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Come on in and find us at the table(s).
item.name: Comedy Show at The Barn
